channel.title: blog on welcome!
channel.description: Recent content in blog on welcome!

item.title: Nextcloud: Importing Google Calendars & Automating External Cals
item.description: Upgrading to Nextcloud 18 broke both importing public Google calendars and external calendars so that they don’t update automatically. Fortunately, both of these issues have workarounds Importing Google Calendars Nextcloud needs a .ics or .ical file. To get a public Google calendar’s .ics location (as of 5/8/20), you need to get the src or cid of the Google calendar. All Google calendars have this in the URL of the calendar.

item.title: The complete Nextcloud Ubuntu Guide
item.description: Getting the machine up-to-date sudo apt autoremove sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade Installing Apache - the webserver sudo apt install apache2 systemctl start apache2 systemctl enable apache2- start apache2 on startup If you’ve configured the server right, you should be able to go to your machine’s IP (you can get this via hostname -I) in the webbrowser of your choice and see the “Apache2 Ubuntu Default Page”

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m Max Vogel. I’m a var today = new Date(); //initializes to current date var bday = new Date(); bday.setFullYear(2002); bday.setMonth(7-1); //January is 0 bday.setDate(27); bday.setHours(0); bday.setMinutes(0); var timeDiff = Math.abs(bday.getTime() - today.getTime()); document.write(Math.floor(timeDiff / ((1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365)))); // ceil time in years ([milliseconds] * [seconds] * [min] * [hours] * [days]) year old who goes to Middleton High School.
